front.title: RADIUS attributes for IPv6 Access Networks

abstract.t: IPv6 nodes can have configuration information provided to them usingDHCPv6 and/or Router Advertisements. This document specifies RADIUSattributes that complement RFC3162 for use with DHCPv6 and/or RouterAdvertisements (SLAAC) for use in network access scenarios.Status of this MemoThis Internet-Draft is submitted to IETF in full conformance with theprovisions of BCP 78 and BCP 79.Internet-Drafts are working documents of the Internet EngineeringTask Force (IETF), its areas, and its working groups.
